name: kanban-fullstack-app
description: Full-stack Kanban app with JWT auth, PostgreSQL, and Vite + React client.

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.render-build: npm install && npm run build && npm run seed

author: Cyrl Casalme
